text_block_list.text:
A few days had passed since the preparation camp 
for the Votive Stage Play began ——

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text:
—— Alright, that's good. I see it's 
really starting to take shape now.

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Today's practice will end here. We'll start rehearsals 
tomorrow so keep up the good work.

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Oh that's right, there's a harvest festival at a nearby shrine 
this evening. Why not take a break and check it out?

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text: They hold a ceremonial Kagura dance there every year too. I suggest you girls take a look, it could be really enlightening.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Hmhmnmu…… here goes—!! ——Yay!! I did it, I won third prize!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Wow! Nice one, Tsuru-chan! 
But～guess～what……

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
—— Tada! 
I got first prize～♪

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text:
Aw man, I lost again! Teio, you're so good! 
Hey, can you give me some tips!? I need tips!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Come on, we've had our fun now, everyone. 
The Kagura dance is about to start.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Gasp! Madam King, that fancy drink you have… where did you find that?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's from that "First-class Tropical Drinks" stand 
over there… Wait! If you start lining up now, we won't 
make it in time! Leave it for later!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
—— Hey, Ms.Urara!? Where are you off to so fast!? 
Wait up, you'll get separated!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……… Haah, haah… we made it just in time……

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Look, it's starting!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: T… That was absolutely stunning…!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Yeah…!! It's dynamic, yet delicate!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
—— Oh, that last jump… Incredible, their movements 
are so sharp but they're syncing up perfectly……

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
That's sooo coool～～!! 
Right, King?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …… Is this… what first class looks like………

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text:
That was amazing! Everything was so polished, almost 
heavenly! True professionalism～!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Stunning from every angle! And the way they worked 
their costumes to flow so gracefully — just awesome!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I think we need that level of dynamism on our stage, 
don't you? Like, being more mindful of how it looks 
from the audience's perspective…!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Absolutely, I want to perfect even the smallest details… 
I'm determined to make it an incredible performance.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah!! …But seriously, King, you've been 
super pumped up since the first day～

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Gasp——! Could it be that Madam King has some hidden memories…!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
There's no such thing. …I'm just committed to excellence. 
Doing my best is simply part of being first-class.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
…… But perhaps you're not so far off. My determination 
has certainly continued to grow stronger. I want to make 
it a success, no question. This story in particular.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
The Shirabyōshi, I believe… embodies the aspect of 
following a great figure, her teacher. Someone whose 
footsteps you need to surpass.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I have those feelings too… That's why I've taken 
this role as my own. I'll perform it to the best of my 
ability and make this the greatest play ever…!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
—— You can do it, Madam King!! I'll give it my all as well! 
All for the best performance ever!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! Let's put on the best show ever and totally blow 
everyone away! All five of us, together!!

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Yeah!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: My essence carries my mentor's legacy and the solemnity of the pillars. I am the vessel of ancestral wisdom, pledging to prolong their esteemed heritage——!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
…… My movements are still a bit weak. The performers of 
that Kagura dance focused intently on every single angle 
of their arms… —— Oh?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
(It's already so late… I need to practice one more time early 
tomorrow before the rehearsal. The last dance, especially, 
requires more refinement ——)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: —— Kyaa!?
